title: Does philosophy help in really understanding ethics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Does philosophy help in really understanding ethics?  Ethics is a subcategory of philosophy. That is, ethics (or moral philosophy) is a type of philosophy. It makes no sense to ask the question “Does philosophy help in really understanding ethics”.

yes. in short, if you want a consistent basis of value in society, it depends on a philosophical foundation to that value system. without that, value becomes something arbitrary which also makes it “not-understandable”.
